meanings.definition: The act of forming a diphthong.
meanings.sent1: Her diphthongizations in the song made it sound unique.
meanings.sent2: The linguist studied the diphthongizations in different languages.
meanings.sent3: During the diphthongizations exercise, the students giggled at the funny sounds.
meanings.sent4: The diphthongizations of vowels transformed the melody of the poem.
meanings.sent5: The diphthongizations were like musical notes blending together.

meanings.definition: The process of changing a monophthong into a diphthong.
meanings.sent1: The diphthongizations in speech can alter the meaning of words.
meanings.sent2: Understanding diphthongizations helps in pronunciation improvement.
meanings.sent3: The diphthongizations workshop was both educational and entertaining.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a magical quality after the diphthongizations.
meanings.sent5: The diphthongizations added a new dimension to the language.
